Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory105.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Bionic Machine', 3: 'Rargh! Ga—!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Rosetta thrusts her spear into the bionic's power connectors, destroying it completely.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'However, she seems to have mistaken the size of the tide. An almost endless horde of bionics are still charging out of the snowy forest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'No... I have to tell those girls to get out of there, now!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Rosetta shoves aside a bionic in the way and scurries out of the forest.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{3: 'As expected, the girls are having a snowball fight on the mountain, completely unaware of the situation.'}
{3: "Rosetta runs over and shouts at the girls anxiously. No time to care about Pfaff's orders."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Run away! The tide is coming!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The girl grabbed by Rosetta stares at her curiously. The other frolicking girls also pause and stare at Rosetta in interest.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "Wait, what's going on? Who are you..."}
{3: 'Anxious, Rosetta turns with the girl in hand, attempting to pull her out of this place by force.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But she pauses at the sight behind her—the forest is still and silent, without any sound of bionics, as if the tide itself had never happened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "Are you... the girl who lives in the forest we've heard rumors about?!"}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Uh, yeah... No, I'm serious! But the bionics, where have they...", 4: '1'}
{3: "The girl, overjoyed, takes Rosetta's hand to show her friends.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Hah! Whaddaya say? I told you the "girl in the forest" wasn\'t just a rumor! That\'s what you get for laughing at me!'}
{3: 'The other girls gather around Rosetta, looking at her curiously.'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "I'm Lisa. What's your name?"}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Rosetta...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lisa', 3: "Hi, Rosetta! Now that we know each other's names, that makes us friends! Come on! Let's play!"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1801.jpg'}
{3: 'Having never talked to anyone before, Rosetta did not know how to say no. In a state of confusion, she allows Lisa to drag her and join the other girls.'}
{3: 'It was a completely new world to Rosetta. She never thought she would be so happy just talking aimlessly with other girls or playing silly games.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{2: 'Lisa', 3: 'Rosetta, thanks for playing with us for so long and telling us so much about the forest!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "No, it's... Yeah, I had a lot of fun...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lisa', 3: 'Great! But I guess you gotta get home. Looks like your grandpa is here to pick you up.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Rosetta turns in surprise and sees Pfaff nearby looking at them.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Grandpa! Sorry... I was worried that the bionics were going to attack the girls. So I had to warn them... I won't do it again!", 4: '1'}
{3: "To Rosetta's surprise, Pfaff did not seem to be angry. Instead, he politely waves at the girls.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Rosetta, don't forget to wave and say goodbye to your friends. You don't want to be rude, do you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lisa', 3: "Bye! Let's play together again sometime!"}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: 'Rosetta, has living in the forest been lonely?', 4: '2'}
{3: "Rosetta's eyes jut wide open at Pfaff's question, but she then quickly shakes her head."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Nope, not at all... I have you and the animals in the forest, Grandpa... And there's the Guardian Spirit. Everything is fine just the way it is.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Pfaff laughs, a hint of resolution in his chuckle. He takes Rosetta by the hand and places the carving knife he bought on her palm.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Pfaff', 3: "I'm getting old, Rosetta. Can't keep running around. Starting tomorrow, you'll have to buy supplies at the port for us in my stead.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'But why, Grandpa?! And the tide, too...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Pfaff', 3: "Don't worry. The Guardian Spirit has returned, and the tide will be gone soon.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Pfaff puts two fingers to his lips and blows a long and loud whistle. Rosetta runs excitedly to the side of the mountain, taking in the view of the sea—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory86.png'}
{3: 'All of a sudden, a mechanical narwhal leaps out of the sea with a splash. The girls stop their snowball fight and cheer in awe.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory216.png'}
{1: '1', 3: 'In the shade of the forest, Temia silently watches over the girls in play.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forest Guard', 3: 'Could we have been like them, had it not been for that accursed experiment...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Temia', 3: 'The past is in the past. We are the Forest Guard—we are sinners with nothing but our duty.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guard', 3: 'Captain...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Temia', 3: "Let's move out, Forest Guards. We must destroy the remaining bionics before nightfall.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forest Guard', 3: 'Roger!', 4: '2'}
